name: challenge-full-stack
description: Full-Stack Developer Challenge - Test your skills across frontend, backend, and database concepts

scripts.test:ci: echo "— You cannot run tests in this repo —"
scripts.test:local: node -e "const funcs = require('./src/main.js'); console.log('Testing functions...'); console.log('isEven(4):', funcs.isEven(4)); console.log('filterAndSearchUsers:', typeof funcs.filterAndSearchUsers); console.log('All functions loaded successfully!');"
